name: Tank prototype
description:
You are able to enter and use a Sherman like tank. There are four different positions in this tank, with most of their specific functions. You can shoot some targets and drive around.

Please consider to leave your opinion in the comment section.

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Look

F - Use
E - Quick bail

Blue orbs change seats.
Engine needs to be started.
Guns need to be loaded.
Hatches can be opened.
Fuel needs to be refilled.

Lights are usable.

Alt + F4 to exit the game.
